```{r outforestef, cache=cacheon}
tabforest <- function(data, outtime, outvar, outval = 1) {
  levs <- levels(edata$nocom_cat)
  levsef <- levels(edata$num_Ef_cat)

  out <- data.frame(matrix(NA, ncol = 8, nrow = length(levs) * 3 + 1))

  out[, 2] <- c(NA, rep(levs, 3))

  colnames(out) <- c("EF", "No comorbs", "hrci", "p", "loghr", "lci", "uci", "pint")

  for (i in seq_along(levsef)) {
    out[i + 1 + ((i - 1) * (length(levs) - 1)), 1] <- levsef[i]

    mod <- coxme::coxme(formula(paste0(
      "Surv(", outtime, ",", outvar, " == '", outval, "') ~ nocom_cat * relevel(num_Ef_cat, ref = '", levsef[i], "') + ",
      paste0(modvars, collapse = "+"), " + (1 | num_nation)"
    )),
    data = data
    )

    se <- sqrt(diag(vcov(mod)))

    rownos <- 1:4
    colplace <- (i + 1 + ((i - 1) * (length(levs) - 1))):(1 + (i * length(levs)))
    out[colplace, 3] <- c(
      "ref",
      paste0(
        fn(exp(mod$coefficients[rownos]), 1),
        " (",
        fn(exp(mod$coefficients[rownos] - global_z05 * se[rownos]), 1),
        "-",
        fn(exp(mod$coefficients[rownos] + global_z05 * se[rownos]), 1),
        ")"
      )
    )
    out[colplace, 4] <- c(NA, fn((1 - pnorm(abs(mod$coeff[rownos] / se[rownos]))) * 2, dig = 3, p = TRUE))

    out[colplace, 5] <- c(NA, mod$coefficients[rownos])

    out[colplace, 6] <- c(NA, mod$coefficients[rownos] - global_z05 * se[rownos])

    out[colplace, 7] <- c(NA, mod$coefficients[rownos] + global_z05 * se[rownos])

    if (i == 1) {
      pint <- car::Anova(mod, type = "III")
      out[1, 8] <- fn(last(pint[, "Pr(>Chisq)"]), dig = 3, p = TRUE)
    }
  }
  return(out)
}
```

```{r outforestefplot, cache=cacheon, dependson="outforestsub"}
plotforest <- function(forestdata) {
  cextext <- 1

  minmy <- round(exp(min(forestdata$lci, na.rm = T)), 1)
  maxmy <- round(exp(max(forestdata$uci, na.rm = T)), 1)

  # c(bottom, left, top, right)
  par(mar = c(4, 17, 1, 1) + 0.2)


  plot(rev(forestdata$loghr), 1:nrow(forestdata),
    cex = 1.5,
    xlim = c(
      log(minmy),
      log(maxmy)
    ),
    xlab = "HR (95% CI)",
    ylim = c(1, nrow(forestdata) + .4),
    axes = FALSE,
    ylab = NA,
    main = NA,
    type = "p",
    pch = 22,
    bg = global_kicols[1],
    col = global_kicols[1]
  )

  for (i in 1:nrow(forestdata)) {
    if (!is.na(rev(forestdata$lci)[i])) {
      matplot(c(rev(forestdata$lci)[i], rev(forestdata$uci)[i]), c(i, i),
        type = "l", add = TRUE, col = global_kicols[1], cex = 1
      )
    }
  }

  matplot(c(log(1), log(1)), c(-1, nrow(forestdata)), type = "l", lwd = 1, lty = 3, add = TRUE, col = 1)

  axismy <- seq(minmy, maxmy, 0.1)
  axismy2 <- axismy
  axismy2[!axismy %in% c(minmy, maxmy)] <- NA

  axis(1,
    cex.axis = cextext, at = log(axismy),
    labels = axismy2
  )
  axis(1,
    cex.axis = cextext, at = log(1),
    labels = 1
  )

  axis(2,
    at = c(1:nrow(forestdata), nrow(forestdata) + 1),
    labels = c(rev(forestdata$EF), "EF"),
    cex.axis = cextext, tick = FALSE, las = 2, line = 16, hadj = 0
  )

  axis(2,
    at = c(1:nrow(forestdata), nrow(forestdata) + 1),
    labels = c(rev(forestdata$`No comorbs`), "No"),
    cex.axis = cextext, tick = FALSE, las = 2, line = 11.5, hadj = 0
  )

  axis(2,
    at = c(1:nrow(forestdata), nrow(forestdata) + 1),
    labels = c(rev(forestdata$hrci), "HR (95% CI)"),
    cex.axis = cextext, tick = FALSE, las = 2, line = 7, hadj = 0.5
  )

  axis(2,
    at = c(1:nrow(forestdata), nrow(forestdata) + 1),
    labels = c(rev(forestdata$p), "P"),
    cex.axis = cextext, tick = FALSE, las = 1, line = 2.5, hadj = 0.5
  )

  axis(2,
    at = c(1:nrow(forestdata), nrow(forestdata) + 1),
    labels = c(rev(forestdata$pint), "P interaktion"),
    cex.axis = cextext, tick = FALSE, las = 1, line = -0.5, hadj = 0.5
  )
}
```
